content: p2 slm round 24 slm p2 pfcnr p2 slm cuff cast on 64 stitches i recommend using a stretchy cast on method i use a long tail cast on divide evenly on two needles and prepare for joining in the round the cable pattern in this sock is worked over 10 stitches it starts on round 1 of the cuff and continues until you start the toe left sock round 1 *k2 p2*4 times k2 pm work first row of left cable pattern pm *k2 p2* 9 times round 2 *k2 p2*4 times k2 slm work second row of left cable pattern slm *k2 p2* 9 times continue working 2x2 ribbing in cuff and work the left curious cable pattern over the 10 stitches between the markers until cuff reaches 1 5 inches or desired length continue working leg as follows right sock round 1 p2 k2 once pm work first row of right cable pattern pm *k2 p2* 12 times k2 round 2 p2 k2 once slm work second row of right cable pattern slm *k2 p2* 12 times k2 continue working 2x2 ribbing in cuff and work the right curious cable pattern over the 10 stitches between the markers until cuff reaches 1 5 inches or desired length continue working leg as follows leg knit every round with the exception of the 10 stitches between the markers just keep working the curious cable pattern left or right depending on the sock over those stitches work until leg has reached your desired length heel flap knit across needle 1 working curious cable pattern between the markers the heel flap will be worked on needle 2 knit across needle 2 turn slp 1 p to end repeat the next two row until you have worked 32 row for heel flap row 1 *slp k1* to end finish with k1 row 2 slp 1 p to end turn heel row 1 slp k17 ssk k1 turn row 2 slp p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 slp knit to one stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn row 4 slp purl to one stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have been worked the last two row will end with ssk and p2tog respectively omitting the k1 or p1 there are 18 heel stitches knit across heel stitches �3 © 2018 two birds
